2077200.name: 3D Chess Q14
2077200.description:
2D / 3D Chess Game with new figures and various boards.

  • Play on boards with 5x5 to 16x16 fields.

  • 3 new Figures: Wizard, Gamma and Keeper

  • 100+ play modes: Single Layer, 3D Stacked Game, Random Attack Games, and Tower Challenge. Play chess or antichess.

  • 3D and 2D views.

  • Level Editor and Community Presets.

  • Play on one computer, online with your friends or against the AI.

  • Optional Anti-Chess mode for all single-level games

  • 3D Stacked: Play on several levels: Each hit figure will be your trophy on the next level. Since a level is done (check or draw), the game continues on the next level.

  • Tower Mode: Play several sized games. The best player wins.

  • Online: Play against other users online.

  • Quick Game: Attach to online games.

  • Snapshots: Create a game snapshot and resume any time.

  • Switch between different visualizations. Board Style, Darkmode, Fullsized Windows, hint fields

  • Dynamic Skins

  • Easy distribution of game sets between users.

  • Optimized for FullHD+ displays.
2077200.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
